mapper.select: SELECT id FROM virtual_object WHERE function_id = #{functionId} AND aspect_id = #{aspectId}

SELECT virtual_object_id as id , created_date , description , modified_date , name , aspect_id , function_id FROM os_vo O, virtual_object V WHERE O.virtual_object_id = V.id AND O.orchestration_service_id = #{orchestrationServiceId}

SELECT V.id , created_date , description , modified_date , name , aspect_id , function_id FROM virtual_object V , ( SELECT T2.virtual_object_id FROM ( SELECT @r AS _id, (SELECT @r := parent_id FROM cvo_vo WHERE composite_virtual_object_id = _id) AS parent_id, @l := @l + 1 AS lvl FROM (SELECT @r := #{value}, @l := '') vars, cvo_vo m WHERE @r <> '' ) T1 JOIN cvo_vo T2 ON T1._id = composite_virtual_object_id ORDER BY T1.lvl DESC ) C WHERE C.virtual_object_id = V.id
SELECT V.id , created_date , description , modified_date , name , aspect_id , function_id FROM cvo_vo C, virtual_object V WHERE C.composite_virtual_object_id = #{value} AND C.virtual_object_id = V.id

select id , created_date , description , modified_date , name , aspect_id , function_id from virtual_object where id in
${list[index].id}
SELECT id , created_date , description , modified_date , name , aspect_id , function_id FROM virtual_object WHERE id = #{value}
